title: Print, "Danger Ahead from Appleton's Journal, April 30, 1870, cover", 1870
signed: Signed on block with initials, lower right: W H
inscribed: Caption: DANGER AHEAD BY WINSLOW HOMER.
creditline: Gift of John Goldsmith Phillips, Jr.
description: "A brakeman works between carriages to slow a train as it passes over water rising beneath a low bridge at night."  Information from David Tatham, Winslow Homer and the Pictorial Press (Syracuse: Syracuse University Press, 2003), p. 163.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Danger Ahead from Appleton's Journal, April 30, 1870, cover", 1870.
1870. Wood engraving on paper. Gift of John Goldsmith Phillips, Jr.. 1947-4-53.
